document_data.name: Pâté
document_data.mainbody: '''Pâté''' was a variety of a dish, usually served as a smallbite, made using a wide variety of ingredients and mystery meats in a mashed spreadable form.
document_data.History: The [[Nubari (ancient)|Ancient]] [[Nubari]] of the [[Malatran Plateau]], many centuries before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], used ''[[spelljammer]]'' trade to import luxurious foodstuffs like pate, [[truffle]], and [[caviar]] from off-world.{{Cite organized play/LJ/Snake Time|8}}
